title: Next door
brief_description: Based on a Kurt Vonnegut Jr story. A young boy left home alone while his parents attend a movie overhears an argument bvetween the couple in the house next door. The boy, becoming increasingly disturbed by the dispute, intervenes in an unusual way. Starring James Wood as the father of the young boy.
